content:
Chat title: {chat_title}
Language hint (may be empty): {language_hint}

Recent messages (JSON array, oldest -> newest):
{messages_json}

Task:
- Summarize the conversation context from these messages.
- Detect the conversation language.
- Infer tone/style (e.g. casual vs formal).
- Choose which specific incoming message (id) is the best target to reply to right now.

Output format:
Return ONLY a JSON object with exactly these keys:
- language
- tone
- summary
- reply_to_message_id

Constraints:
- reply_to_message_id must be one of the message ids present in the messages JSON (prefer a message where from_me=false).
- Keep summary short (3-6 sentences). No markdown. No commentary.
